items.title: CJA Leads Nearly 200 Organizations in Opposing NEPA Rollback
items.description:
CJA Coalition Signs Letter Condemning White House Proposal to Revoke Key Environmental Safeguards, Warns of Harm to Vulnerable Communities and Environmental Justice Washington, D.C. – The Climate Justice Alliance (CJA), in partnership with GreenLatinos and WeAct, has led a coalition of nearly 200 organizations in condemning the White House’s recent proposal to repeal all versions […]

The post CJA Leads Nearly 200 Organizations in Opposing NEPA Rollback appeared first on Climate Justice Alliance.

items.title: CJA Weighs in on the Cost of House Republican’s Disastrous Continuing Resolution and the Continued Undermining of Environmental Justice
items.description:
Contact: Kayla@unbendablemedia.com Washington, D.C. — Ahead of congressional votes on the partisan Republican-led Continuing Resolution and the recent announcement regarding the closures of all Environmental Justice offices by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), the Climate Justice Alliance (CJA) released the following statement from KD Chavez, executive director of Climate Justice Alliance: “Yesterday, Trump and his […]

The post CJA Weighs in on the Cost of House Republican’s Disastrous Continuing Resolution and the Continued Undermining of Environmental Justice appeared first on Climate Justice Alliance.

items.title: CJA Black Caucus Regranting Program
items.description:
Climate Justice Alliance’s Black Caucus announced the recipients of its regranting program. A total of $170,000 will be regranted to 11 organizations spanning 9 states to make a meaningful impact within Black communities. Each organization has the flexibility to allocate the funds as they see fit, provided they are used to benefit Black members of […]

The post CJA Black Caucus Regranting Program appeared first on Climate Justice Alliance.

items.description:

items.title: EPA Cancels Climate Justice Alliance Grant
items.description:
The Administration continues its attacks on working class communities, rural and urban families with its announcement of the cancellation of the Climate Justice Alliance’s UNITE-EJ program grant.

The post EPA Cancels Climate Justice Alliance Grant appeared first on Climate Justice Alliance.

items.title: Climate Justice Alliance Sunsets UNITE-EJ, Its Thriving Communities Grantmaking Program, After Still Not Receiving Obligated EPA Funds
items.description:
After Tireless Advocacy to Fight for Obligated Funding, Environmental Justice Communities Lose Access to 50+ Million in Federal Funding Contact: Kayla@unbendablemedia.com The Climate Justice Alliance — a named recipient of the EPA’s national Thriving Communities grantmaking program— is sunsetting its UNITE-EJ grantmaking program after the EPA still has not disbursed $50+ million in obligated funds. […]

The post Climate Justice Alliance Sunsets UNITE-EJ, Its Thriving Communities Grantmaking Program, After Still Not Receiving Obligated EPA Funds appeared first on Climate Justice Alliance.

items.title: Statement on Inauguration Day 2025
items.description:
As President Trump announced his plans on day one today, the executive director of the Climate Justice Alliance issued the following initial statement: “The real emergency isn’t at the border—it’s in the gutting of workers’ rights and the dismantling of our communities. Our families deserve clean air, clean water, and a future that isn’t dominated […]

The post Statement on Inauguration Day 2025 appeared first on Climate Justice Alliance.

items.title: CJA Welcomes New Executive Director
items.description:
After completing an extensive and thoroughly competitive search over the summer and into the fall of 2024, CJA’s Board of Directors chose KD Chavez as new Executive Director!

The post CJA Welcomes New Executive Director appeared first on Climate Justice Alliance.
